特記事項:
この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。

本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
関連科目: No specific courses but this is an intermediate course so your English and study skills should be reasonable or it will be a very hard course for you.
授業の概要・背景: The objectives of this course are to develop students’ fluency in academic settings, and to make students ready for their research in university. Various types of academic materials will be practiced in class and as homework. Students demonstrate their comprehension of these materials through debates, discussions, presentations, written summaries and short research reports. This course meets twice a week.
